ConnectionStrings.PlainTextConnectionString: Data Source=localhost\SQLEXPRESS; Initial Catalog=DB name; User ID=sa; Password=pass1234; MultipleActiveResultSets=True;
ConnectionStrings.PartiallyEncryptedConnectionString: Data Source=Protect:{(local)\SECONDINSTANCE}; Initial Catalog=Protect:{Secret_Catalog}; User ID=Protect:{secret_user}; Password=Protect:{secret_password}; MultipleActiveResultSets=True;
ConnectionStrings.FullyEncryptedConnectionString: Protect:{Data Source=server1\THIRDINSTANCE; Initial Catalog=DB name; User ID=sa; Password=pass5678; MultipleActiveResultSets=True;}
